message: Hi, I have been using this app and its made facebook authentication a breeze, so thanks for that. I wanted to know, is there a way that instead of a fixed LOGIN_REDIRECT url defined in settings.py, I can pass a redirect url as a parameter. This way I can put the the login to facebook button at any page in my website and the user is redirect to the same page after completing authentication.

@sid6376, I think I've replied by email already, but just for the record on this forum, that can be accomplished by using the "?next=" parameter when defining the link, like "/social/begin/facebook/?next=/foo/bar"
